attributes.text:
Clase para una barra de progrso animada, la barra de progreso comienza en 0 y termina en 100

var progressBar = new AnimateProgressBar(5000);
progressBar.start(function(){
//hacer en cada intervalo - si llego al tiempo total esperado
progressBar.stop(function(){
//hacer cuando se se completa la barra
},this);
},this);

Recordar jugar con las matematicas para ver en cuantas secciones se divide la barra de progreso segun el tiempo de espera y la longitud waitTime/maximun

Returns the (computed) value of the property __completeEvent.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__completeEvent}.
(Computed) value of __completeEvent.

Returns the (computed) value of the property __part.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__part}.
(Computed) value of __part.

Returns the (computed) value of the property __timer.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__timer}.
(Computed) value of __timer.
Initial value for property __completeEvent.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property __completeEvent with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__completeEvent}.
the default value
Initial value for property __part.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property __part with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__part}.
the default value
Initial value for property __timer.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property __timer with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__timer}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property __completeEvent.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__completeEvent}.

Resets the user value of the property __part.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__part}.

Resets the user value of the property __timer.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__timer}.
New value for property __completeEvent.

Sets the user value of the property __completeEvent.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #__completeEvent}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property __part.

The unmodified incoming value.

funcion a ejecutar cada vez que transcurra el intervalor
contexto en el que se lleva a cabo la funcion
metodo para el inicio y la ejecucion en cada intervalo
funcion a ejecutar cuando este completa la carga de la barra
contexto en el que se lleva a cabo la funcion
metodo para la ejecucion en cada intervalo y para si el tiempo es igual al maximo esperado
propiedad para saber si se puso el evento de complete
propiedad para cargar cada seccion de la barra de progreso
propiedad para el timer del progreso
tiempo de espera total (en milisegundos) el menor valor es 100
metodo de inicializacion de la clase
